name: Singled Out (itch)
description:
In Singled Out you must identify your target in a crowd of weirdos before time runs out. The quicker you are, the higher you score!

  • You have 10 seconds to shoot the GALACTIC SUPERCRIMINAL.
  • Identify the target using the 3 descriptions provided.
  • Only one person in the crowd has all 3 traits. Don't shoot the wrong one!

Singled Out is a short, simple but challenging arcade game where the goal is simply to beat your high score or last as long as you can. It's ideal for 5 minute breaks or parties (where everyone can work together and yell at the person playing).

Features
  • 10 million randomly-generated weirdos.
  • 30 challenging levels and a final boss.
  • Family Friendly Mode: remove all references to violence and shooting for an experience better suited to younger players.
  • Practice Mode: disable the strict time limit to practice in a casual, stress-free environment.
  • Memory Mode: unlock this challenge mode to truly put your skills to the test.
  • Achievements.
  • Controller support.

NOTE: Online Leaderboards are available in the Steam and Nintendo Switch versions but not this standalone version.

Singled Out started life as an entry in the GMTK 2019 game jam, and it was hand-picked by Mark Brown for the Top 20 games out of 2,600 other entries.

Already played the original GMTK game jam version of Singled Out? Think you've seen everything it has to offer? Think again!

This full release expands on the original with new modes, updated visuals and sound, improved difficulty curve, improved random face generation system, online leaderboards (Steam only), achievements, controller support and more!

Singled Out's development was supported by some generous people via Patreon. Thank you!
